author: cperezz.eth
content:
I got the same exact error.
It's weird. I add the randomness with the mouse and the secret. This brings me to `Bind Your Contribution`. I then go to SIWE portal and use the same wallet to sign again.
This brings me back to the `Bind your contribution` and I get stuck with the same exact error.

I think something weird happens when SIWE is selected TBH

author: bridge-bot
content:
<nicoserranop> Could you check if after pressing "Submit" in the entropy page, the console logs are showing "PoTpubkeys generated"?


The error I identified was that we were not waiting for the async potPubKey generation function to execute before navigating to the bind your contribution page.
